T  y2,
T  x3,
T  y3 
)

Compute discriminant function.

Returns determinant of 

   [ x1 x2 x3 ]
   [ y1 y2 y3 ]
   [ 1  1  1  ]

Function returns true if (x, y) is inside, or on the boundary of triangle.

The triangle whose vertices are (xi, yi), i=1,2,3.
